title: indika
author: indika
created_time: September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 06:11:29 PM by indika
content: My wallet got unautorize transectionI ve conect my wallet to air drophttps://layeromnizero.com/And they stolened my10000 sfp tokenAnd 1026 matic tokenAny body know how to getMy funds backIts my life savingIf i not get my funds back il suiside my kifePlz help meHere is transection hash0x228f52c7fb1a561a7c0a63392d55e56a8ca47d6321b06e0967cfd23fc292abed0xe3b62c5a3a0c18d86848db65a69e6667588e146ffab923425ebbc5d2d6541fe3My wallet address plz check and help meTotalNearly 10000 sfp token     1026 matic token lostPlz help meMatic address0x297d2674c47D091678B0b51F01AE429AA045D2F6Sfp address0x297d2674c47D091678B0b51F01AE429AA045D2F6

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.created_time: September 26, 2023, 05:59:14 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 06:30:59 PM by Nwada001
comments.body: If you still have anything left in that wallet, move it to a safer place first before looking for help; the hackers might come back to revisit the wallet again.I'm so sorry for your lost tokens; it's really heartbreaking. You just have to make yourself strong. If this is a hack from some airdrop scammers, I believe the tokens might have been far gone by now, so I will advise you to try as much as you can to move on and take this one now as a lesson not to make such a horrible mistake again in your life. Because the chances of you getting those funds back are really, really small. This is one of the reasons why newbies are always advised to limit the way they search and rush into some airdrop, especially those that require users to connect their wallets, and even if you can't take your eyes off them, then create a separate new wallet and go with that one. It will really be less risky that way as there will be nothing in that wallet for hackers to make away with.Edit: Just check your wallet above now and you still have $1,688.77 worth of Shiba Inu and $100+ of GMT token. I will advise you to move that out now. The wallets share the same phrase, so those funds in other chains are also not safe. There is enough BnB to cover up the transaction fee. Create a new wallet and move that out.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMMy wallet got unautorize transectionI ve conect my wallet to air dropCode:https://layeromnizero.com/And they stolened my10000 sfp tokenAnd 1026 matic tokenAny body know how to getMy funds backIts my life savingIf i not get my funds back il suiside my kifePlz help meWhat kind of airdrop? have you joined any airdrop? The website is not working but website domain is not looking real because official link is https://stargate.finance/ and if any future airdrop will happen you will only claim from this website.Feeling sorry for you but If it's true what you are saying than no way to recover your fund. Just be passion and try to earn money from other sources. Suicide will not give you anything but just more tention to your family. Life is gift and we should value life. would you like to share address where you lost token?

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Unfortunately nothing can be done about this, even mozilla is giving me a warning when I tried to access that site.Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMIf i not get my funds back il suiside my kifeI know you must feel awful know and all kinds of crazy thoughts are going through our head, but no money is worth your life. The same way you made what you had, you will get again. I am speaking you from my personal experience because at one point when I  was still new I also lost basically all I had. My first thought was not to touch anything crypto related evert again, but after a day or two when I calmed down I took at at yet another life lesson. Next time invest some money into hardware wallet so things like this don't happen again.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Do not connect your wallet to a fake website, else your wallet will be compromised and your coins will be stolen. The stolen coins transaction can not be reversed.Quote from: Rikafip on September 26, 2023, 06:03:14 PMNext time invest some money into hardware wallet so things like this don't happen again. It can affect any wallet as long as the victim used his wallet to connect to the fake website. You can see the link posted by the OP, it is a fake site that someone can connect his wallet to and the wallet will be compromised.

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.created_time: September 26, 2023, 06:11:27 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 06:25:56 PM by Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMMy wallet got unautorize transectionI ve conect my wallet to air drophttps://layeromnizero.com/And they stolened my10000 sfp tokenAnd 1026 matic tokenAny body know how to getMy funds backIts my life savingIf i not get my funds back il suiside my kifePlz help meSorry to hear that buddy. This incident reminded me of an incident that happened to me on 2k22. help needed I got attacked by hacker???It's like same cases. A lot of funds from transferred by hackers of my own wallet which was connected. I caught mine by being a victim of phishing while downloading the cracked game file. Here I think if your matic and others coins transaction are complete then I don't think there is anything else to do.So the things are to do now is, I quoted their suggestion given to me on that timeQuote from: PowerGlove on August 18, 2022, 05:54:41 AMI would consider your current machine compromised. Follow these steps:Unplug/disconnect it from the internet immediatelyBackup any important data onto an external driveStart again with a fresh OS installationKnuckle-punch yourself really hard in the eye for downloading and running random executables from torrent sites!Once you have a safe machine again, you should also probably do a round of password changes on all of your online accounts...Now I want to tell you that I have overcome from that situation. Everything is fine now rather better than before. So don't be crazy, be cool buddy

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMIts my life savingIf i not get my funds back il suiside my kifePlz help meHey buddy, please calm down. I know it hurts to lose your life savings, but suicide is not the only option. If you kill yourself, will you be able to get those funds back after life? No, the best thing is not killing your self, but you should pick your self up from this and try to man up, it's okay to feel hurt, it's okay for your to also feel as if you have lost everything, it's okay for you to start thinking where you will start from, and it's also okay for you to start thinking of all the years and time it took you for you to accumulate all that and have them saved, all it cost you the time and things you deprived your self of just for you to be able to save that up.  But I must tell you this: don't allow those taught to push you to take a hatch decision; don't allow them to make you feel less human; you are still alive and you can still acquire something back; you just have to wipe those tears out. Take this as a lesson that will make you stronger; try to increase your security in your wallet; reduce the sites you visit, especially with the device with which you have your funds; and, for the main time, always don't stay alone; look for family and friends to associate yourself with; and try to forget about this. Please don't ever see suicide as part of any option; it's never a good one, and it will never be fine. It might take time for you to heal, but believe me, you will use today as an experience and as what motivated you towards what you will achieve in the future.

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.created_time: September 26, 2023, 06:17:53 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 08:44:10 PM by albert0bsd
comments.body: It is really hard to heard histories like that   Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMMy wallet got unautorize transectionIt was really unautorized? Since you conect your wallet to that site i think that you inadvertently authorized it. It is clearly a theft from they, but you allowed it.Sr. MemberActivity: 486Merit: 250Bro i should expected more caution from a senior member with that amount of messages.You may know that blockchain transactions are irreversible

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMMy wallet got unautorize transectionI ve conect my wallet to air drophttps://layeromnizero.com/And they stolened my10000 sfp tokenAnd 1026 matic tokenAny body know how to getMy funds backIts my life savingIf i not get my funds back il suiside my kifePlz help meHere is transection hash0x228f52c7fb1a561a7c0a63392d55e56a8ca47d6321b06e0967cfd23fc292abed0xe3b62c5a3a0c18d86848db65a69e6667588e146ffab923425ebbc5d2d6541fe3My wallet address plz check and help meTotalNearly 10000 sfp token     1026 matic token lostPlz help meMatic address0x297d2674c47D091678B0b51F01AE429AA045D2F6Sfp address0x297d2674c47D091678B0b51F01AE429AA045D2F6You are senior member in the forum and should know that connecting your wallet, where you have this amount of money, to airdrop site is not safe. Are you sure you really took all the security threads seriously? There is nothing wrong hunting for airdrop but you should only do that with a wallet you have nothing inside. Most of the hacks is connected with airdrop and giveaways, this should send a signal that it is not safe connecting your wallet to the website. I wish I can help you but I don't really know how. Maybe some other forum members who have the technical skill can assist. Sorry for your loss.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: I am really sad about your loss buddy, nothing can be done about it. Even I got scammed at the start of the year by address poisoning of $5k. I can see it was your life saving, but do you know what life has for you ahead? This isn't a reason for you to suicide. Never think about that. Reach out to your family, by sharing this with them, it will really help you get some mental health. Do not think about this anymore, it's done and dusted. Focus on your future, if you are studying, focus on your education and if you are a working man/woman, focus on your job. You will grind again. Good Luck!

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on September 26, 2023, 06:08:00 PMIt can affect any wallet as long as the victim used his wallet to connect to the fake website. You can see the link posted by the OP, it is a fake site that someone can connect his wallet to and the wallet will be compromised.True, but with hardware wallet at least you have to press physical button and confirm transaction, meaning chances are that he would (probably) realize that someone is trying to take his money. Quote from: Odohu on September 26, 2023, 06:18:49 PMYou are senior member in the forum and should know that connecting your wallet, where you have this amount of money, to airdrop site is not safe.This can happen to anyone, no matter the forum rank and/or experience, all it takes is not being focused at what you are doing atm. I know a guy who is in crypto for many years and living solely out of it since 2013 and few years ago he managed to lose $100k in a similar manner (he was in a rush and wanted to buy some shitcoin, went to a phishing site thanks to Google offering it as a first result, connected his Metamask and lost everything on it). Quote from: Odohu on September 26, 2023, 06:18:49 PM Maybe some other forum members who have the technical skill can assist. Sorry for your loss. No one can help him get his money back, he may online get PM for scammers claiming that they can get his money back.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: I feel really sorry for you, I don't know how can I help you, because the tokens are gone now, and there is no way to return or redo the transaction until the attacker sends you the funds back by himself. I don't know what to say, but god will help you, and do not say such curse words. I can understand your feelings, the amount is very big, but money can come back but life can not, if one door closes then other doors to new earnings will be opened. Those MFs who stole your funds will come to their end via Karma. You my friend don't worry. I know my words are not enough for you, but for now that' all I can do.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Sorry about your loss mate.  It is unfortunate that such happened to you. This made me curious to be also wondering that  as a senior member who should be guiding newbies here is still falling for scam site. You should have the knowledge and idea that it is not safe connecting your main wallet to a website and allowing access to your funds wether you grant access or not do not think they would have access to your funds only just allowing access without granting permission for transaction. Hacker these days have sophisticated ways of hijacking wallet and stealing from them. It baffles me that a senior member would be having such experience. Anyways it just might happen to anyone and it takes vigilance and alertness to be able to remain safe while dealing.What can be done now is just to report that wallet so it could be flagged by the chain developers while you go to the comment section of the chain explorer to make comments there as regards the wallet address activities calling on anybody who cares to know and do away with transacting with such wallet.Lastly of you still have anything left in n that wallet do well to move it away because I checked and I saw some reasonable amount of Shiba Inu still remaining and it would be good you create another wallet and move them there. Committing suicide will not bring back your assets as they are already gone. I know the pains you are going through right now losing your life time savings to scammers. It hurts bad. Next time you should learn not to save your assets in one wallet. Learn to spread your assets across different wallets for your safety. Of you had done that I think the lose would have been minimal and would not have bothered you alot. Suicide is not the best option mate. There are lots of people who lost much more than this and are still alive doing just fine. Life is not duplicate but one. If you commit suicide what would it profit your? When you can work it out to getorw money. Think positively Nd refrain from doing such mate. You will recover all you have lost.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PMIf i not get my funds back il suicide my kifeThat's a pretty bad idea why would you kill yourself?The problem is why did you connect your main wallet to an unknown website that asks for wallet authorization?I'm also one of the victims of fake airdrops I'm lucky that I have a separate wallet for testing with a small amount. Most of these fake airdrops ask for wallet authorization but after you authorize them you will not notice that some of your tokens are gone. I'm sorry to tell you that you won't be able to reverse the transaction.What you can only do is monitor the hacker's address until they transfer tokens to exchanges. Once they transfer tokens to the exchange you can report it right away to the exchange where they sent your token and they can maybe able to help you and send your funds back to your wallet address.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: indika on September 26, 2023, 05:53:50 PM~I'm so sorry about this mate, it's very sad to hear such new in times like this when the economy is pretty stressful. You should take it slow, there's no money much more valuable than you life right now. As long as you have breath, you can always make more. But this time you have to be more careful. From this, you have seen why it is not advisable to connect your wallet to unknown sites. For airdrops, you should consider using a separate wallet where you don't store your coins, this will help prevent scam activities just incase. A lot of newbies will have to learn from this. You have to becareful where you connect you wallet. Not all airdrops are legit, some are phishing attempt created by scammers. We have to be extra careful at this point. The saddest news now is that there's no way to get your funds back. You have to move what ever you have left away from that wallet to a safer one.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on September 26, 2023, 06:25:18 PMI am really sad about your loss buddy, nothing can be done about it. Even I got scammed at the start of the year by address poisoning of $5k. I can see it was your life saving, but do you know what life has for you ahead? This isn't a reason for you to suicide. Never think about that. Reach out to your family, by sharing this with them, it will really help you get some mental health. Do not think about this anymore, it's done and dusted. Focus on your future, if you are studying, focus on your education and if you are a working man/woman, focus on your job. You will grind again. Good Luck!Well said, if Op is a senior member, it doesn't make him beyond or above mistakes. No one knows how he got himself into such a mess. Since no possible method can retrieve his funds, the only help we can render him is, talking him out of his suicidal thoughts. This is what is most important in his life right now. Depression can lead him to think abstractly. I'd add that Op should not see himself as a complete failure. He can start all over again, and see better rewards in his life. He fell victim to some coin sweepers that gained control of his wallet and took everything in it. What a bad experience, yet it's not the end. Good opportunities still awaits Op if only he can withstand this few months of suffering and stress.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: albert0bsd on September 26, 2023, 06:17:53 PMBro i should expected more caution from a senior member with that amount of messages.You may know that blockchain transactions are irreversible Those are just airdrop merits, dude has never earned a single merit for himself so it’s safe to say he’s still a newbie, so a lot of them don’t actually know how to keep themselves safe online.Op, one quick advice because I’m certain that you’ll still participate in airdrops, if you ever want to take part in an airdrop that’s requesting you to connect your wallet and grant them some permission make sure you create a new wallet and use it for it don’t ever make the mistake of connecting your wallet just because they promised a big reward for participants. Or you could create a dedicated wallet for your airdrops and once you receive the reward whether it has been listed or not moved it to a different wallet that you have never connected to any site before.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Another airdrop scam victim here again, because we have discusedalot of cases regarding such possible wallet connect, most Mmes try to avoid  being able to steal from you.The thing is that you shouldn't trust some of the new projects that require players to connect their wallet to the site all in the name.

comments.author: indika
comments.body: My brother got heart attack and he is in hospitel he advised to get help from comiuniti we are not native englishCan someone plz  help us to report this fund stolen to authoritiesHaker twitter profile its verified thats why he trust himhttps://ibb.co/nszHB1R

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: It's unfortunate that you've fallen for a phishing site, it's very difficult to get a refund unless you give it up through no fault of your own.Quote from: indika on September 27, 2023, 03:30:38 AMCan someone plz  help us to report this fund stolen to authoritiesIt is difficult to report this kind of thing, it takes time and money so it is difficult to identify even if the wallet is named phishing.No one can do much about it.Quote from: indika on September 27, 2023, 03:30:38 AMHaker twitter profile its verified thats why he trust himDo you trust this cheap blue tick verified twitter? Oh man it's very common for scammers to disguise themselves with blue ticks, but their dark side is scamming spreading phishing sites.
